summary: Frontend testing for two bug fixes: 1) Payment status badges now correctly show 'Paid' for fully paid bookings, 2) Vendors page replaced 'Add Vendor' with 'Clone from Client' button

features_tested.payment_badge_paid: PASS - Bookings with payment_status='paid' show green 'Paid' badge
features_tested.payment_badge_partial: PASS - Bookings with payment_status='partial' show blue 'Partial' badge
features_tested.payment_badge_pending: PASS - Bookings with payment_status='pending' show 'Pending' badge
features_tested.clone_from_client_button: PASS - Vendors page has 'Clone from Client' button (not 'Add Vendor')
features_tested.clone_dialog_opens: PASS - Clone from Client dialog opens with list of clients
features_tested.clone_dialog_search: PASS - Dialog has search input to filter clients
features_tested.clone_dialog_buttons: PASS - Found 32 'Clone as Vendor' buttons for different clients
features_tested.edit_vendor_dialog: PASS - Edit vendor dialog opens correctly for editing existing vendors

critical_code_review_comments: getPaymentBadge function correctly handles 'paid', 'completed', 'partial' and default (pending) cases
Vendors page correctly replaced Add Vendor functionality with Clone from Client workflow
context_for_next_testing_agent: Payment badges and Clone from Client features verified working. The getPaymentBadge function at line 749-760 in Bookings.js handles paid/completed/partial/pending statuses correctly. The Vendors page Clone from Client dialog allows selecting a client and cloning them as a vendor.
